  1. workout
    These exercises will not assist you look higher, however they are doing one thing even as vital — strengthen the girdle floor muscles that support the bladder. robust girdle floor muscles will go an extended manner toward preventing incontinence. whereas many ladies square measure aware of Kegels, these exercises will profit men too.
